Filter V(D)J data

Source: R/filter-vdj.R
filter_vdj.Rd

Filter V(D)J data

filter_vdj(
  input,
  filt,
  clonotype_col = "clonotype_id",
  filter_cells = FALSE,
  vdj_cols = NULL,
  sep = ";"
)

Arguments

input

Single cell object or data.frame containing V(D)J data. If a data.frame is provided, the cell barcodes should be stored as row names.
filt

Condition to use for filtering meta.data
clonotype_col

meta.data column containing clonotype IDs. This column is used to determine which cells have V(D)J data. If clonotype_col is set to NULL, filtering is performed regardless of whether V(D)J data is present for the cell
filter_cells

Should cells be removed from the object? If FALSE (default) V(D)J data will be removed from the meta.data but no cells will be removed from the object.
vdj_cols

meta.data columns containing VDJ data to use for filtering.
sep

Separator used for storing per cell V(D)J data If set to NULL (recommended) columns are automatically selected based on the given separator.

Value

Object with filtered meta.data
